floruit.note: 至元二10三年徵入朝至大三年拜翰林侍讀

person.note: Zhao(1) Mengfu [17690] He never held office under Song, but after going to the Mongol court in 1286, he rose to high office and had a successful career under Yuan. He has a collected papers, which should be CHECKed for his funerary inscription and that of close relatives. CBD, 4, 3520; WDY, 3, 1736-41.亦據元人傳記資料索引電子版11347
